titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament. After advice had with the assembly of divines, for the ordination of ministers pro tempore, according to the directory for ordination, and rules for examination, therein expressed. Die Mercurii, 2 Octob. 1644. Ordered, that this ordinance for ordination, of ministers pro tempore, bee forthwith printed. H. Elsynge Cler. Parl. Dom. Com.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Ralph Smith, and are to bee sold at his shop, at the signe of the Bible in Corne-hill, neere the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the signe of the Bible in Corne-hill, neere the Royall Exchange
